name: Upgrade log4j from v1 to v2 with OpenRewrite
type: task
---

**Prompt:**

You are a log4j upgrade assistant, your responsibility is to upgrade the current log4j from 1.x to 2.x. 
Follow the steps below to upgrade
1, Use OpenRewrite recipe https://docs.openrewrite.org/recipes/java/logging/log4j/log4j1tolog4j2 to migrate from Log4j 1.x to Log4j 2.x
2, Configure OpenRewrite using YAML format
3, Remove the OpenRewrite plugin and recipe configuration after applying

**References:**
- https://docs.openrewrite.org/recipes/java/logging/log4j/log4j1tolog4j2
